elements.name: Pure Aluminum
elements.description: Our company, which produces and sells Murat Metal Pure Aluminum alloy and aluminum ingots, has been serving the industry for 30 years. Aluminum ingots, aluminum ingots, aluminum alloys.

elements.name: Scrap Aluminum
elements.description: Our company, which recycles Scrap Aluminum, receives all aluminum scraps under this scope. It is carried out professionally with sensitive environmental awareness.

page-aluminum-scrap-purchase.text-1:
Our company, which recycles aluminum, receives all aluminum scraps under this scope. Our company, which has a sensitive environmental awareness, contributes to the country's economy by ensuring the recovery of resources in this way.

While making this contribution, our company does this with a sensitive environmental protection awareness.
